channel.title: Posts on Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Learning

item.title: Environmental Solution: Creative Problem Solving through Teamwork
item.description: Imaginons et créons des solutions liées à l’environnement ! Groups of 5 to 7 students create and then present an original performance about exploring the ocean and solving a real life water problem.

item.title: Another Awesome Post
item.description: Fifth abundantly made Give sixth hath. Cattle creature i be don’t them.

item.title: A post without an Image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: A Totally Response Theme
item.description: Fifth abundantly made Give sixth hath. Cattle creature i be don’t them.

item.title: Let's combine our ideas
item.description: Team members shared their machine designs and explored possible solutions. They questioned each other and took time to listen attentively to weigh options and feedback each other.In the end this team decided to retain the strong points of each design and COMBINE them into one big idea.

item.title: Name of the work 1
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.
